Articles.Content:
Is there a way to set the ap/pe (to something other then 80km it is by default) of an orbit when launching something using the set orbit and if so how?

Edited November 14, 2021 by DaOPCreeper

Yes. By setting the semimajor-axis and the eccentricity to the appropriate values.

The values in the set-orbit page are the orbital elements of the target orbit, see e.g. the Wikipedia page: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Orbital_elements

One initially confusing issue is that the semimajor-axis on the set-orbit page includes the radius of the target body, in contrast to the altitude,  AP,  PE values given in the game.
